text: Matlock is an American mystery legal drama television series. It starred Andy Griffith as defense attorney Ben Matlock. The television series was broadcast on ABC and on NBC. The series was set in Atlanta, Georgia. It ran from September 1986 through May 1995. The series had 9 seasons and 195 episodes. The series had several spin-offs such as Jake and the Fatman and Diagnosis: Murder. ==References== ==Other websites== * Andy Griffith as Ben Matlock An unofficial Matlock website * Ben Matlock at TV Acres A page dedicated to Ben Matlock, including notable case synopses and list of Simpsons quotes.
